data.text:
The hotel is closed to the train station easy to reach from the airport, room was clean and bed was comfortable,  it can be noisy at times as wall are thin, but that didn’t bother us.
breakfast was good and the hall area is nice and cozy. 
And the rooftop is a plus after a day of exploring Barcelona.
data.title: Short weekend in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sichomar09, 
Thanks for your review about our hotel.

We're chuffed to hear you found our location convenient and that our clean rooms and comfy beds hit the mark for you. It's great that you enjoyed the breakfast and found our hall area cozy – we love it when guests feel at home. And yes, our rooftop is indeed the perfect spot to unwind after a day out in Barcelona! Sorry to hear about the noise issue, though; it seems Barcelona's vibrant energy can sometimes be a little too enthusiastic. Rest assured, we're always looking for ways to ensure our guests have the most restful stay possible.

It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the future. 
Kind regards,

Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
This is a great hotel to base yourself in Barcelona for a city stay.

5 minutes walk from Paral-lel metro station for easy to get where you want to go.

Situated in a bit of an uninspiring area which may look a bit drab, the hotel is modern, clean and very comfortable.

Breakfast was extra at euro 13, but was very good.

The room rate was very good value - although the room wasn't large, it was big enough for what you need when using as a base.

Nice bar and restaurant on site too.

I'd highly recommend staying here.
data.title: Great base for a city stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Norbert,
Thanks for taking the time to share your views about your visit to our hotel.

It's fantastic to hear that you found our hotel to be a great base for your city stay and that our location was convenient for your adventures around Barcelona. Cheers for pointing out the proximity to Paral-lel metro station—getting around the city should indeed be a breeze! We're thrilled that you appreciated the modernity and comfort of our hotel, as well as the quality of our breakfast buffet. It's also great to know that you found value in our room rates and enjoyed the onsite bar and restaurant. 

We hope to provide you with a more enjoyable stay in the future.
Kind regards,

Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: This is a scam hotel with phantom good reviews. If you want to check into a hotel with NO WiFi, no fridge, no boiling kettle, no toiletries, no TV remote control, a CHOKED bathroom and worse - a front desk service who argues back, then please book this hotel.
data.title: WORSE HOTEL IN MY LIFE

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sally,
Thanks for sharing your experience with us.

While it looks like your stay didn't quite hit the high note we aim for, we appreciate your feedback. We're genuinely sorry to hear about the issues with the TV remote and the momentary Wi-Fi outage- it's a disappointed when tech doesn't work as it should. However, I'm happy to say that these were temporary hiccups and were resolved for you promptly. 

Regarding the kettle, we do have one available at reception 24/7 for guests to use, although we understand it's more convenient to have one in the room. And about the fridge, it seems there was a bit of a mix up as our rooms don't typically include one, and our room amenities are clearly stated in our description to avoid any surprises. 

We would like to clarify that our receptionist was trying to propose a room change that was more in line with your expectations when you ended the call, and despite further attempts to contact you there has been no reply. Our priority is our guests wellbeing and we hope that the rest of your stay is more to your satisfaction.

Kind regards,

Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
Casa Lit does honor it's name. Bright, spacious, clean, yet relaxed atmosphere. Rooms aren't big (yet big enoug)  but feel larger because of use of mirrors and light. Good bed, clean nice bathroom. I slept streetside second floor with window open  (don't like aircocondition) no problem with noise. Hallway has a luxurious feel. Major assets: rooftop and the  area where one can sit, with sofas, seats, a workspace and lockers. It's next to the breakfast area which is a nice place and breakfast is good. Ample choice, fresh good stuff.
Location perfect when you need to be in harbour. Street doesn't look good but it didn't matter (there's a policestation one block away round the corner). Within couple minutes walk from metro. You can easily walk to Barri Gothic and Ramblas.
Last but not least: the staff! Such friendly helpfull people, kudos for them 😀
data.title: Bright spot for a pleasant stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Judith,

Thank you for taking the time to let us know your opinion of your recent stay.

We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our bright and spacious atmosphere, as well as the cleanliness and relaxed vibe of our hotel. It's great to know that our rooftop and common areas were a major asset for you during your stay. We're also glad that our location was convenient for your needs, being close to the metro and various attractions.

We appreciate your kind words about our staff, as we strive to provide friendly and helpful service to all our guests. We understand that the street outside might not look the best, but we're glad that you didn't have any issues with noise or safety. As you mentioned, our hotel is in a safe area with regular police patrols.

It would be our pleasure to have you return on another occasion. 
Very best wishes,

Casa Lit by Ona Hotels
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Arrived late at 7.30 pm and immediately went out for something to eat . The surrounding area isn't to the standard of the hotel but we enjoyed a meal at Asian ways and a couple of beers . I would recommend the Thai restaurant which cost about 50 pounds but with starters , main meals and 2 rounds of beers . Went back and had another couple of drinks at the hotel rooftop bar . This was reasonably priced and had a small pool as well. Probably a great place after a day out sight seeing to chill out. Staff were outstanding . Very attentive and polite and spoke excellent English which helped when asking for directions . Room slightly small but decorated to a high standard . Would have been 5 star if in a better area
data.title: One night before our cruise

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to share your review.

We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our rooftop bar and found our staff to be outstanding and attentive. 

It's great to know that our high standard of decoration in the rooms met your expectations as well.

We understand that the surrounding area might not be up to the same standard as our hotel, but we're glad you found a nice Thai restaurant nearby. 

As for the room size, we offer various room types to cater to different preferences, and we'd be happy to help you find a more spacious option for your next stay.

We hope that you will consider returning to stay with us in the future.
Kindest regards,

Casa Lit by Ona Hotels
